content: **this pattern is available for free on the blog or in a purchased ad-free pdf** a set of cute round coasters perfect for livening up your home this season worked flat and in the round there s no sewing required the puff stitches give texture and interest to the finished coaster and the single_crochet/slip_stitch border gives the coasters a nice finished edge each coaster uses about 25 yards of yarn - making them perfect for using up scraps from old projects finished coasters end up ~4 25 wide in diameter i used all knit pick s dishie yarn for mine but would suggest using any type of worsted weight cotton yarn you like - i just had a lot of dishie on hand when i made these
